name: Dive to Survive
description:
This game is all about diving. An unknown force has attacked our planet. During the fight a highly toxic neurotoxin was released, killing a big part of civilization. You manage to stay alive since the gases didn’t reach you directly. The toxin can’t reach you underwater, so you have to build an underwater base in order to survive and sit out the attack.

For controls press 'shift' ingame.

Best enjoyed in fullscreen!
